mapper.select: SELECT cpass FROM cusertb WHERE cuserid = #{cuserid}

SELECT a.cuserid, a.cpass, a.cusnm, a.phone, a.cmail, a.bsnum, a.cleader, a.caddr, a.adate, a.mdate, COALESCE(b.boardcnt, 0) AS boardcnt, COALESCE(c.jobpostcnt, 0) AS jobpostcnt, COALESCE(d.jobaplycnt, 0) AS jobaplycnt FROM cusertb a LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT authorid, COUNT(*) AS boardcnt FROM boardtb GROUP BY authorid) b ON a.cuserid = b.authorid LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT cuserid, COUNT(*) AS jobpostcnt FROM jobposttb GROUP BY cuserid) c ON a.cuserid = c.cuserid LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT cuserid, COUNT(*) AS jobaplycnt FROM jobaplytb GROUP BY cuserid) d ON a.cuserid = d.cuserid where a.cuserid = #{cuserid}
mapper.update: UPDATE cusertb SET cpass = #{cpass}, caddr = #{caddr}, phone = #{phone}, cleader = #{cleader}, cmail = #{cmail}, mdate = now() WHERE cuserid = #{cuserid}
